original_text: Those who had seen it told the people what had happened to the demon-possessed man—and told about the pigs as well.
korean_text: 이에 귀신 들렸던 자가 당한 것과 돼지의 일을 본 자들이 그들에게 알리매

sentences.original_text: what had happened to the demon-possessed man
sentences.korean_translation: 귀신 들린 사람에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지

sentences.original_text: and told about the pigs as well
